caption: This image features a tranquil and somewhat somber seascape under an overcast sky. The sun, appearing as a muted globe, is situated in the upper third of the image, slightly off-center, casting a soft, diffuse light that gently illuminates the scene. Below the sun, a vast body of water fills the lower two-thirds of the frame, its surface rendered in a dark, bluish hue suggesting either dawn or dusk. On the right side of the horizon, a large column of dark smoke rises up, blending into the gray sky and introducing a stark contrast in an otherwise calm environment. The smoke suggests some distant activity, possibly industrial or related to a fire, impacting the scene's natural serenity. The overall mood is one of quietude, tinged with an element of disturbance from the smoke on the horizon.
title: Morning fog clearing on oxnard plain, a prime agricultural area now being developed for housing near oxnard, California north of Los Angeles.  Some 84 percent of the state's residents live within 30 miles of the coast, and this concentration has resulted in increasing land use pressure.  Restrictions on coastal development within 1,000 yards of the shoreline have tightened with the passage of the coastal zone conservation act in november, 1972
